alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Broadwater; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 8:18PM MDT until August 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Broadwater County in southwestern Montana... Eastern Madison County in southwestern Montana... Southeastern Beaverhead County in southwestern Montana... Southeastern Jefferson County in southwestern Montana... Central Gallatin County in south central Montana... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 817 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harrison to 11 miles east of Ennis to 21 miles west of Divide Lake to 15 miles northeast of Kilgore, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Hail up to pea size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Three Forks, Manhattan, Harrison, Norris, Big Sky, Mcallister, Bozeman Hot Springs, Lakeview, Gallatin Gateway, Targhee Pass, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Raynolds Pass, Logan, Red Rock Pass, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Trident, Church Hill, Willow Creek, and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
